title: Ep66: The Swinger Lifestyle Feat a Swinging Couple
itunes:title: Ep66: The Swinger Lifestyle Feat a Swinging Couple
description:
On this episode, Mandii sits down with a couple who has joined the swinger lifestyle. The group discuss the Future debacle that swept social media this last week and then dig into the juicy stuff. The kink of the week involves the conversation around identifying as a straight male who is curious and sexually aroused by transgenders and this leads into a threesome story with a cross dresser. The couple then breaks down how they have managed to successfully maintain a happy, healthy relationship while bringing others into their bedroom and couple swapping. Could swinging be an option for your relationship? Contact the couple from this episode on IG @theblaxicancouple Follow us on social media: Mandii @Fullcourtpumps Weezy @weezywtf WD Twitter @whoreiblePod IG: whoreible_decisions and use the hashtag #whoreibledecisions Support the show and become a patron. Receive bonus content and see the live shows by becoming a patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions To send a hoemail, email us at Whoreibledecisions@gmail.com In the NYC area and seeking a studio to record your podcast? Check out @gothampodcaststudio

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
